welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Granite City, where the charm of small-town America meets the hustle and bustle of the big city. Known for its rich history and scenic landscapes, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our vibrant community has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport, handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport mainly serves low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Belleville Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Belleville Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
